feed.title: Immich-Frame Releases

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.17.1
entry.content:
[!NOTE]
This is a hotfix mainly for #191

What's Changed

‚ö° Fixes

  • Fix: Dead link to Settings.example.json by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/187
  • Fix: Handle no exif-date by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/191

üìì Documentation

  • docs: update renewimagesduration by @mmomjian in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/189
  • docs: specify transition duration as a float by @mmomjian in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/188

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.17.0...v1.0.17.1

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üåê immichFrame WebApp

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.19.0
entry.content:
[!Warning] The setting FontColor was renamed to PrimaryColor. Rename this setting in your configuration!

[!Note] All clientapps can be downloaded here.

What's Changed

‚ö†Ô∏è Breaking Changes

  • Feat: Clock & Metadata styling by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/199

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Feat: Setting for people description by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/197
  • Feat: Date Filter for images by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/200

üìì Documentation

  • Feat: Landing page - Added brief instructions for all platforms by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/202

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.18.0...v1.0.19.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.20.0
entry.content:
[!Note] All clientapps can be downloaded here.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features

  • Base font size by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/205

‚ö° Fixes

  • Bug: Date format not using locale by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/218

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Feat: Server side image caching by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/216

üî® Maintenance

  • Create codeql.yml by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/213

üöÄ Other changes

  • Bump @sveltejs/kit from 2.5.25 to 2.8.4 in /immichFrame.Web in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/208
  • Bump vite from 5.4.2 to 5.4.11 in /immichFrame.Web in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/207
  • Bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/212
  • Revert "Bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 3 updates" by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/220

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/208

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.19.0...v1.0.20.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.21.0
entry.content:
[!Tip]
Try out the ImmichFrame demo here!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features

  • Create new API for getting images outside of WebView. by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/228

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Feat: Identify client requests by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/231
  • Add text-shadow to app.css to improve readability by @iCanHazSkillz in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/232

üî® Maintenance

  • Chore: Migrate Component to Svelte 5 Syntax by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/215

üöÄ Other changes

  • fix: handle recurring events in calendar by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/229

New Contributors

  • @iCanHazSkillz made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.20.0...v1.0.21.0
